page.title: 14Merrydown Wines
page.content:
As I write, demolition of the defunct Merrydown Cider factory has begun. The roofs have been stripped and the site is being cleared for a housing development. The factory closed in 2004 and the oak vats were removed fairly soon after. Since then, the place has fallen into disrepair, the only working part of the site being the off-licence, which will soon be closing too.
Robin Holland
